Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 104th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1971...
Traded from Syracuse to Northeastern on 7/7/1974 (Going to SYR: P J. Fleites, C T. Linnane. Going to NE: C C. Herrero, P D. Pardo, LF D. Castillo)...
Had first career hit on 9/13/1975, off Frank Leber (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1976, off Nathan Burdge (Mal)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1981 to a minor league contract.
Released by New Jersey on 4/7/1982...
Released by Plum Grove on 4/7/1985...
